dublin_core.dcvalue: A mobile phone application used by CHWs that tracks malaria cases and reports to the central DHIS2 system. CHWs diagnose and treat malaria at the village level and enter data into the application. Data is reviewed by District Health Personnel on reporting rates, commodity stocks and malaria burden indicators to monitor performance of remote clinics.
Anna Winters, Epidemiologist, Akros, Email: awinters@akros.com | Zunda Chisha, Malaria Surveillance Program Manager, Email: zchisha@akros.com
MACEPA, USAID, Isdell Flowers, Zambian Anglican Council
